description: Observations regarding change of use from class B8 storage or distribution to class D2 & B1 on ground floor part class B1 use on basement  1st & part 2nd floor retention of class C3 on part 2nd floor and 3rd floor.
decision_conditions: It is difficult to give observations in view of the sketchy nature of proposals. Our primary concern relates to traffic impact. The premises are close to residents' parking not subject to protection at night and weekends and the applicant should satisfy you that traffic generated by the proposed use will not mean that residents' rights to park is reduced. We would want you to ensure no adverse impact on residential amenity from noise and general disturbance.
